videoSnippet.title: Tal Treats Petrosian to A Night at the Opera
videoSnippet.description:
#agadmator Mikhail Tal vs Tigran Vartanovich Petrosian
URS blitz (1975) 
French Defense: Tarrasch Variation (C03)

1. e4 e6 2. d4 d5 3. Nd2 Ne7 4. Ngf3 Nd7 5. Bd3 c5 6. ed5 Nd5 7. O-O cd4 8. Nb3 Nc5 9. Bb5 Bd7 10. Bd7 Qd7 11. Qd4 Qa4 12. c4 Nb3 13. ab3 Qa1 14. cd5 Qa6 15. Re1 O-O-O 16. Bf4 Rd5 17. Rc1 Kd8 18. Bg5 Ke8 19. Ne5 b6 20. Qa4

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

judgment.name: Blunder
judgment.comment: Checkmate is now unavoidable. Bc5 was best.
